workflow.title: Workflow
workflow.description: Defines states, transitions, roles, and business service ID used by the workflow engine.
workflow.uiHints: Setup the state machine used in workflow-service. Each state can define actions and role permissions.

bill.title: Billing
bill.description: Contains billing logic and tax head mapping to generate demand.
bill.uiHints: Define tax heads and fee amounts used to calculate billing demand.

idgen.title: ID Generation
idgen.description: Defines formats for generating unique application and license numbers.
idgen.uiHints: Use placeholders like [CITY], [SEQ], [YYYY] for dynamic ID generation.

documents.title: Documents
documents.description: Defines required document types, mandatory flags, and applicable roles.
documents.uiHints: Each document should have a code, type, and role applicability.

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.description: Configuration for search filters and list views in employee/citizen inbox.
inbox.uiHints: Customize the filters and table columns visible in the TL inbox.

rule.title: Validation Rules
rule.description: Defines field-level validation patterns and messages.
rule.uiHints: Use regex to restrict values for fields like phone, PAN, email.

localization.title: Localization
localization.description: Supports translation keys and messages for multi-language support.
localization.uiHints: Provide labels and messages as i18n key-value pairs.

accessControl.title: Access Control
accessControl.description: Maps roles to screen-level and action-level permissions.
accessControl.uiHints: Restrict access to config sections, fields or screens per user role.

calculator.title: Calculation Logic
calculator.description: Defines amount formulas, slabs, and conditions for fee calculation.
calculator.uiHints: Use formula and slab-based config for dynamic fee computation.

search.title: Search Config
search.description: Defines which fields are searchable by users or employees.
search.uiHints: Configure which fields are visible in the search form and results.

uiInfo.title: UI Information
uiInfo.description: Customizes UI like visibility, order, tooltips, and default values.
uiInfo.uiHints: Control field-level UI behavior including tooltips and visibility.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Defines notification triggers, channels (SMS/email), and templates.
notifications.uiHints: Configure messages sent to users when actions are performed.
